sentence: El condado tambin est cerca de los distritos de dos republicanos electos que fueron fundamentales para ayudar a Trump a intentar subvertir las elecciones: el representante estadounidense Scott Perry y el senador estatal Doug Mastriano, que provienen de distritos al oeste de Lancaster y participaron en los esfuerzos de Trump para presionar al Departamento de Justicia para que apoyara sus falsas afirmaciones sobre el fraude electoral.
author: Por Jeremy Herb
title: Cmo el asalto al Capitolio del 6 de enero cambi lo que significa ser republicano en un condado de Pensilvania

sentence: Brandon Bell | Getty Images The House select committee investigating the Jan. 6 Capitol riot issued subpoenas Tuesday to Arizona Republican Party Chairwoman Kelli Ward, GOP State Sen. Doug Mastriano of Pennsylvania and four others over their alleged efforts to interfere with the certification of the 2020 election results.

title: House probe of Jan. 6 Capitol riot subpoenas Arizona GOP leader Kelli Ward, 5 others over alternate electors

sentence: Oz with a slim lead, but he's by no means out of the woods,? one Keystone State-based GOP operative told the Morning Report on Monday, adding that the worst-case scenario involves Barnette and state Sen. title: The Hill's Morning Report  Primary night: All eyes on Pennsylvania

sentence: Trump's grip on the GOP was further illustrated Tuesday night when Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a strong supporter of Trumps repeated attempts the past year and a half to re-litigate his 2020 election loss, won his primary.

title: Stefanik, Mullin introduce House resolution to expunge second Trump impeachment

sentence: On Tuesday, May 17, the Big Lie and the Stop the Steal? movement enjoyed a major victory when Pennsylvania State Sen. Doug Mastriano a far-right Christian nationalist and QAnon ally won the 2022 GOP gubernatorial nomination in the Keystone State.
author: Alex Henderson
title: A Las Vegas paper just published a stunning editorial: 'We are struggling to identify' Republicans 'who are not an active threat' to democracy

sentence: The latest from the campaign trail In the runup to Tuesday's Republican primary for governor, an advertisement filled the state's airwaves declaring that Sen. Doug Mastriano staunchly opposed abortion and mail-in balloting and embraced Trump's lies about the 2020 election.

title: As right-wing violence spreads, Republicans duck responsibility

sentence: The races are being closely watched to see if more far-right candidates across the country can follow in the footsteps of Doug Mastriano, who won Pennsylvania's Republican primary race for governor last week by running a campaign focused on pushing Trump's election falsehoods.
author: Daniel Bush
title: Georgia Primaries Will Test Trump's Revenge Campaign Against GOP Incumbents

sentence: During the Republican primary in Pennsylvania, Mr. Shapiro, the state's attorney general, ran an ad that called State Senator Doug Mastriano one of Donald Trump's strongest supporters.
